ygData.subject: Re: Re: lore items
ygData.msgSnippet: Lim but it is....If you always got the item then you wouldnt have any kinda pride or anything about it and everyone would have one I like to be one of the only
ygData.messageBody:
Lim but it is....If you always got the item then you wouldnt have any kinda
pride or anything about it and everyone would have one I like to be one of
the only people with stuff like our guild we would go and get all the items
on server first and we wouild keep them no selling and we kept them as
trophys....Like we had first writhing staff...mithril breastplate...we had
first gm event and we got mithrila rmor out of it...WHich my picture was on
the vault for it :) we got first bone armor we got first full suit of
crafted and first rubicite armor...And no one is allowed to sell any of
it...it took a long time to get all the stuff and it should be the same
always Thats why items are RARE. It would be so dumb the other way. In fear
plane you get something nice every loot practically...to bad fear planes down
when its back to normal Ill renew my account so please tlel whne its back to
normal
